item.title: How to Grow Ixora Plant from Cuttings
item.dc:creator: neilmahaseth
item.description:
Hi friends in this video I will show you how to easily propagate Ixora plant from cuttings. I will share with you the details about each step and the current...

The post How to Grow Ixora Plant from Cuttings appeared first on Plants My Love.
item.content:encoded:
Hi friends in this video I will show you how to easily propagate Ixora plant from cuttings. I will share with you the details about each step and the current status after 1 Month.

▼Scan @ Video Index▼

  • 00:00 Intro
  • 00:18 Ixora Plant Information
  • 2:00 Type and Length of Ixora Cuttings
  • 2:40 Preparing Ixora Cuttings
  • 3:07 Cutting Soil Growing Medium
  • 3:38 Rooting Hormone Application
  • 4:24 Adding Humidity Dome
  • 6:06 Sunlight Requirement and Time Required
  • 7:56 Cutting Update After 1 Month

The post How to Grow Ixora Plant from Cuttings appeared first on Plants My Love.
